      public void tupleSet​(byte[] record, int offset, int length)

      Parameters:

      offset - the offset of the tuple ( =0 by default)
      length - the length of the tuple

    • setHdr

      public void setHdr​(short numFlds, AttrType[] types, short[] strSizes) throws java.io.IOException, InvalidTypeException, InvalidTupleSizeException
      setHdr will set the header of this tuple.
      Parameters:
      numFlds - number of fields
      types - [] contains the types that will be in this tuple
      strSizes - [] contains the sizes of the string
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - I/O errors
      InvalidTypeException - Invalid tupe type
      InvalidTupleSizeException - Tuple size too big
